previouslyApplied.default: Select if you or someone else at your address have previously applied for a loan

previouslyHadIntegrationLoan.default: Select if the loan was granted or not

whoReceivedPreviousLoan.default: Select who was granted the loan

partner.default: Select if you have a partner with you in the UK or not

joint.default: Select if you are applying for a loan together with your partner

dateOfBirth.default: Enter your date of birth in the correct format
dateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

brpNumber.default: Enter your BRP number in the correct format

niNumber.default: Enter your National Insurance number in the correct format

hasOtherNames.default: Select if you have been known by any other names

homeOfficeReference.default: Enter a Home Office reference number in the correct format

partnerBrpNumber.default: Enter your partner's BRP number in the correct format

partnerDateOfBirth.default: Enter your partner's date of birth in the correct format
partnerDateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

partnerNiNumber.default: Enter your partner's National Insurance number in the correct format

partnerHasOtherNames.default: Select if your partner has been known by any other names

convicted.default: Select if you have ever been convicted of a crime in the UK

convictedJoint.default: Select if you or your partner have ever been convicted of a crime in the UK

dependents.default: Select if you have any dependants living with you

dependentDateOfBirth.default: Enter dependant's date of birth in the correct format
dependentDateOfBirth.before: Enter a date that is in the past

dependentRelationship.default: Enter the dependant's relationship to you

building.default: Enter details of your building and street

incomeTypes.default: Select options for your monthly income

combinedIncomeTypes.default: Select options for you and your partner's monthly income

salaryAmount.default: Enter total salary amount per month

combinedSalaryAmount.default: Enter total salary amount per month

universalCreditAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit amount per month

combinedUniversalCreditAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit amount per month

childBenefitAmount.default: Enter total child benefit amount per month

combinedChildBenefitAmount.default: Enter total child benefit amount per month

housingBenefitAmount.default: Enter total housing benefit amount per month

combinedHousingBenefitAmount.default: Enter total housing benefit amount per month

otherIncomeAmount.default: Enter total other income amount per month

combinedOtherIncomeAmount.default: Enter total other income amount per month

outgoingTypes.default: Select options for your monthly outgoings

combinedOutgoingTypes.default: Select options for you and your partner's monthly outgoings

rentAmount.default: Enter total rent amount per month

combinedRentAmount.default: Enter total rent amount per month

householdBillsAmount.default: Enter total utility bills amount per month

combinedHouseholdBillsAmount.default: Enter total utility bills amount per month

foodToiletriesAndCleaningSuppliesAmount.default: Enter total food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount per month

combinedFoodToiletriesAndCleaningSupplie.default: Enter total food, toiletries and cleaning supplies amount per month

mobilePhoneAmount.default: Enter total mobile phone amount per month

combinedMobilePhoneAmount.default: Enter total mobile phone amount per month

travelAmount.default: Enter total travel amount per month

combinedTravelAmount.default: Enter total travel amount per month

clothingAndFootwearAmount.default: Enter total clothing and footwear amount per month

combinedClothingAndFootwearAmount.default: Enter total clothing and footwear amount per month

universalCreditDeductionsAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit deductions amount per month

combinedUniversalCreditDeductionsAmount.default: Enter total Universal Credit deductions per month

otherOutgoingAmount.default: Enter total other outgoings per month

combinedOtherOutgoingAmount.default: Enter total other outgoings per month

savings.default: Select if you have any savings

combinedSavings.default: Select if you or your partner have any savings

purposeTypes.default: Select what you will use the loan for

accountName.default: Enter the name on your account

sortCode.default: Enter your sort code in the correct format

accountNumber.default: Enter your account number in the correct format

contactTypes.default: Select how we can contact you

email.default: Enter your email address in the correct format

phone.default: Enter your mobile phone number in the correct format

likelyToMove.default: Select if you are likely to move to another address in the next 4 weeks

outcomeBuilding.default: Enter details of the building and street

hadHelp.default: Select if you had any help making this application

helpFullName.default: Enter the full name of the person who helped you

helpRelationship.default: Enter the person's relationship to you

helpContactTypes.default: Select how we can contact the person who helped you

helpEmail.default: Enter the person's email address in the correct format

helpPhone.default: Enter the person's mobile phone number in the correct format
